snippet.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom is a mixed-reality experience developed by Sunrise. Players will wield the ability to inspect and observe battles with Mobile Suit Gundams. Explore the integrated gallery and see Gundams like never before. Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom is launching soon to Meta Quest.
